name: MNEMONIC
description:
MNEMONIC is a first person rogue-lite game featuring fast parkour gameplay. Play as a Mind Diver, tasked with reaching into the minds of clients to obtain valuable information. Navigate through perilous terrain and confront powerful guardians using a variety of combat options and agile movement mechanics.

What's in the demo?

Currently the demo provided will allow players to test and provide feedback on the movement mechanics within MNEMONIC. Additional features and polish will continue to be implemented throughout the year, so please come back in the future to see further progress!

How to Play

Find and reach the Gate in order to proceed to the next level. There are only 2 levels so far in this demo, but in the future more levels and a more solid gameplay loop will be implemented.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Sprint / Dash (While in air)

Left Ctrl - Slide

Backspace - Reset Level (Debugging)
